2824.description: Smash 150 more Bamboo Stalks around the Ninjago Monastery.

2825.description: Smash 250 more Bamboo Stalks around the Ninjago Monastery.

2827.description: Craft any 5 of Johnny Umami's special recipes.

2828.description: Craft 15 more of any of Johnny Umami's special recipes.

2829.description: Craft 50 of any of Johnny Umami's special recipes.

2830.description: Craft 125 of any of Johnny Umami's special recipes.

2831.description: Smash Chopov and retrieve the Scythe of Quakes.

2832.description: Smash Krazi and retrieve the Nunchuks of Lightning.

2833.description: Smash Bonezai and retrieve the Shurikens of Ice.

2834.description: Smash Frakjaw and retrieve the Sword of Fire.

2835.description: Smash Chopov in the Earth Shrine until he drops a Maelstrom Dark Blade.

2836.description: Smash Krazi in the Lightning Shrine until he drops a Maelstrom Bone.

2837.description: Smash Skeleton Commandos on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve a Maelstrom Bone Axe.

2838.description: Smash Skeleton Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve a Maelstrom Blacksmith's Hammer.

2839.description: Smash Skeleton Raiders in the Ninjago Caves until you find a Maelstrom Double Bone Dagger.

2840.description: Smash Frakjaw in the Fire Shrine until he drops his Maelstrom Mace.

2841.description: Smash Skeleton Overseers in the Siege Towers until you retrieve a Maelstrom Double-Bladed Axe.

2842.description: Smash 10 Skeleton Troopers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2843.description: Smash 3 Skeleton Commandos on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2844.description: Smash 8 Skeleton Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2845.description: Smash 3 Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2846.description: Smash 4 Skeleton Raiders in the Ninjago Caves.

2847.description: Smash 2 Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.

2848.description: Smash 4 Skeleton Mad Scientists in the Ninjago Caves.

2849.description: Smash 2 Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.

2850.description: Smash 10 Skeleton Coffins on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2851.description: Smash 1 Skeleton Siege Tower on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2852.description: Smash 4 Skeleton Siege Shields on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Archery Targets.

2853.description: Smash 3 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Dragon-in-the-Boxes.

2854.description: Smash and rebuild 2 Skeleton Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2855.description: Smash 5 Skeleton Ladders on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Bouncers.

2856.description: Smash 5 Lightning Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery.

2857.description: Smash 5 Fire Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery.

2858.description: Smash 5 Bamboo Stalks in the Ninjago Monastery.

2859.description: Smash 5 Ice Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery.

2860.description: Smash 5 Earth Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery.

2862.description: Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard, wants a Dirt Sandwich from Johnny Umami.

2863.description: Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard, wants a Chilly Freezesteak from Johnny Umami.

2864.description: Hari Howzen, the Guard in the Ninjago Caves, wants 1 Yucki-Yaki from Johnny Umami.

2865.description: Hari Howzen, the Guard in the Ninjago Caves, wants 2 Bento Blocks from Johnny Umami.

2866.description: Rescue all 6 captured Villagers in the Ninjago Caves.

2867.description: Collect the Dragon Relic of Earth from the Earth Garden in the Monastery.

2868.description: Collect the Dragon Relic of Lightning from the Lightning Garden in the Monastery.

2869.description: Collect the Dragon Relic of Ice from the Ice Garden in the Monastery.

2870.description: Collect the Dragon Relic of Fire from the Fire Garden in the Monastery.

2871.description: Discover the center courtyard of the Ninjago Monastery.

2872.description: Discover the Dojo of Earth in Ninjago.

2873.description: Discover the Dojo of Lightning in Ninjago.

2874.description: Discover the Dojo of Ice in Ninjago.

2875.description: Discover the Dojo of Fire in Ninjago.

2877.description: Discover the Cave of Ancient Ways.

2878.description: Discover the Cave of Black Echoes.

2879.description: Discover the Cave of White Whispers.

2880.description: Discover the Ice Shrine in the caves below the Ninjago Monastery.

2881.description: Discover the Lightning Shrine in the caves below the Ninjago Monastery.

2882.description: Discover the Fire Shrine in the caves below the Ninjago Monastery.

2883.description: Learn to use Earth Spinjitzu Lanterns and burrow into the earth!

2884.description: Learn to use Lightning Spinjitzu Lanterns and zap across sheer drops!

2885.description: Learn to use Ice Spinjitzu Lanterns and smash boulders of ice!

2886.description: Learn to use Fire Spinjitzu Lanterns and blast up into the air!

2905.description: Use the Earth Key to open the treasure chest in front of Cole.

2906.description: Use the Lightning Key to open the treasure chest in front of Jay.

2907.description: Use the Ice Key to open the treasure chest in front of Zane.

2908.description: Use the Fire Key to open the treasure chest in front of Kai.

2913.description: Quick Build 5 Archery Targets on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2914.description: Quick Build 25 more Archery Targets on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2915.description: Quick Build 5 Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2916.description: Buy the Ki Filled Hood from Tomoko Moonstone in the Ninjago Monastery.

2917.description: Equip the Ki Filled Hood you bought from Tomoko Moonstone.

2918.description: Interact with the Earth Spinjitzu Lantern near Cole in the Dojo of Earth to use its power.

2919.description: Quick Build 25 more Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2920.description: Talk to Kodo Pandaheart, one of the Guards outside the Monastery Gates.

2921.description: Talk to Cole in the Monastery Dojo of Earth.

2922.description: Fly to Nexus Tower and speak to Nexus Naomi about the Nexus Force Championships.

2923.description: Use the Speedchat menu in the lower left to perform a Cheer for Nexus Naomi!
